menu_items.title: on
menu_items.desc:
shows a list of plants.
upon selecting a plant, shows all visitors observed on that plant.
menu_items.field_name: plant that the organism was found on

menu_items.title: nectaring at
menu_items.desc:
shows a list of plants.
upon selecting a plant, shows all organisms observed nectaring at that plant.

menu_items.title: eating
menu_items.desc: shows a list of organisms observed eating.

menu_items.title: at nest boxes
menu_items.desc: shows a list of organisms observed at nest boxes.
